channel.title: [PI] Adding interface
channel.description:
Yeah so I tried to follow some tutorials but it still wont work. here's my code: [Code=java] public static void showInterface(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(25900);
setChildren(13, Interface); addSprite(25901, 0, "Interfaces/Interfaces/Background");// Background addHover(25902, 3, 0, 23903, 1, "", 17, 17, "Exit");//Close Button addHovered(25903, 2, "", 17, 17, 23904);//Close Button setBounds(25901, 12, 45, 0, Interface);//background setBounds(25902, 476, 53, 1, Interface);//Close Button setBounds(25905, 199, 54, 2, Interface);//Title setBounds(25906, 19, 126, 3, Interface);//Image setBounds(25907, 65, 259, 4, Interface);//BUTTON1 setBounds(25908, 65, 259, 5, Interface);//BUTTON1HOVER setBounds(25910, 115, 264, 6, Interface);//Button 1 Text setBounds(25911, 265, 259, 7, Interface);//BUTTON2 setBounds(25912, 265, 259, 8, Interface);//BUTTON2HOVER setBounds(25914, 335, 264, 9, Interface);//Button 2 Text setBounds(25915, 36, 83, 10, Interface);//Text1 setBounds(25916, 36, 95, 11, Interface);//Text2 setBounds(25917, 36, 107, 12, Interface);//Text3 } [/code] help ? :C

item.title: [PI] Adding interface
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Yeah so I tried to follow some tutorials but it still wont work.
hereâ€™s my code:

public static void showInterface(RSFont[] TDA) {
	RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(25900);

	setChildren(13, Interface);
	addSprite(25901, 0, "Interfaces/Interfaces/Background");// Background
	addHover(25902, 3, 0, 23903, 1, "", 17, 17, "Exit");//Close Button
	addHovered(25903, 2, "", 17, 17, 23904);//Close Button
	setBounds(25901, 12, 45, 0, Interface);//background
	setBounds(25902, 476, 53, 1, Interface);//Close Button
	setBounds(25905, 199, 54, 2, Interface);//Title
	setBounds(25906, 19, 126, 3, Interface);//Image
	setBounds(25907, 65, 259, 4, Interface);//BUTTON1
	setBounds(25908, 65, 259, 5, Interface);//BUTTON1HOVER
	setBounds(25910, 115, 264, 6, Interface);//Button 1 Text
	setBounds(25911, 265, 259, 7, Interface);//BUTTON2
	setBounds(25912, 265, 259, 8, Interface);//BUTTON2HOVER
	setBounds(25914, 335, 264, 9, Interface);//Button 2 Text
	setBounds(25915, 36, 83, 10, Interface);//Text1
	setBounds(25916, 36, 95, 11, Interface);//Text2
	setBounds(25917, 36, 107, 12, Interface);//Text3
}

help ? :C
